energy.usef.core.workflow.transformer

Class FlexRequestTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.workflow.transformer.FlexRequestTransformer

  • public class FlexRequestTransformer
extends Object
    Transformer class for handling Flex related transformations.

    • Method Summary

      Transforms a List of PtuFlexRequestDto to a list of PTU.
      static PTU transformPtuToXml(PtuFlexRequestDto ptuFlexRequestDto)
      Transforms a PTU of a Flex Request from the DTO format to the XML format as specified by the XSD specification.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public static PtuFlexRequestDto transform(PtuFlexRequest flexRequest)
        Transform a PtuFlexRequest from the database model to a PtuFlexRequestDto.
        Parameters:
        flexRequest - - The PtuFlexRequest to transform.
        Returns:
        a PtuFlexRequestDto to use in the workflows.

      • transformFlexRequest

        public static FlexRequestDto transformFlexRequest(List<PtuFlexRequest> ptuFlexRequests)
        Transforms a list of PtuFlexRequest to a unique FlexRequestDto object.
        Parameters:
        ptuFlexRequests - List of PtuFlexRequest.
        Returns:
        a FlexRequestDto or null if the input parameter is null or empty.

      • transformPtuToXml

        public static PTU transformPtuToXml(PtuFlexRequestDto ptuFlexRequestDto)
        Transforms a PTU of a Flex Request from the DTO format to the XML format as specified by the XSD specification.
        Parameters:
        ptuFlexRequestDto - PtuFlexRequestDto.
        Returns:
        a PTU.

      • transformPtusToXml

        public static List<PTU> transformPtusToXml(List<PtuFlexRequestDto> ptuFlexRequestDtos)
        Transforms a List of PtuFlexRequestDto to a list of PTU.
        Parameters:
        ptuFlexRequestDtos - List of PtuFlexRequestDto.
        Returns:
        a List of PTU in the same order.
